QuestData.Title: The Savage Dwarves
QuestData.Description: The Horde has done much for us Revantusk, and we're no freeloaders. With the other forest troll tribes pushed back, we're striking out to claim more land in the name of the Horde.$B$BBut now the Wildhammer dwarves are getting in our way. If it's a war they want, it's a war they'll get... and I don't plan to lose a war to creatures half my height.$B$BGet out there and kill me some dwarves.
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill 10 Wildhammer Warriors or Wildhammer Shaman.
QuestData.CompletionText: Don't be loitering' around the village all day now. If you're staying with us, I expect you to fight for us.
QuestData.RewardText: That will show the Wildhammer to stay away from our lands!$B$BCrazy dwarves should've stayed in the mountains...
